protocol.name: P-AFFY-3
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-35063
protocol.text: WT plant were grown in growth chambers under a 16/8-h, 22C/20C day/night cycle, with white fluorescent light, at light intensity: 100 umol m-2 s-1.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-35064
protocol.text: WT plant grow under LD until bolting, then transfer to continuous light for six days (LL). Plants are irradiated with W, cR, cFR, and cB with inflorescence covering, and DD as control. For different qualities of light treatment, the inflorescence-covered plants were irradiated with red (10 umol m-2 s-1), far-red (1.13 W m-2), and blue light (15 umol m-2 s-1)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-35065
protocol.text: As handbook of Rneasy Plant mini extract kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-35066
protocol.text: 10 ug total RNA were used for cDNA synthesis, labeled by in vitro transcription followed by fragmentation following the manufactorys suggestion (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual rev5, Affymetrix).
